body.p: John Tanner was Committed to the Garrard County Jail for the alleged murder of his wife, two children and sister-in law and for Arson -- he escaped the Jail on the night of the 15. -- inst and is now going at large --

He is about 35 or 40 years old. 5 feet six or Eight inches high, dark hair rather sallow compliction -- weighs about 135lbs has a stopage ^or stammering^ in his speech, articulates imperfect, and in the habit of repeating the last words of every sentence -- at first the impression is made that he is simple minded or foolish --
I suggest a reward for his apprehension

yours truly
N Sandifer P, J, G, C, C

Garrard Co
Reward
$300,
for John Tanner
22d July/64
